ComicInfo.Summary: Warren Ellis and Mike Wolfer ratchet up the pressure in the penultimate chapter of the third arc of Gravel! Can Gravel survive as the King Of Magic in Britain? Forces he couldn't imagine just a few months ago are gathering against him. For the first time, he has innocent lives at stake -- not fellow soldiers, but kids he recruited into the game of magic. He's facing the first battle he never trained for... Itâ€™s never a dull day being Combat Magician William Gravel. This issue is available with a regular or wraparound cover by Mike Wolfer.
